title: Translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese
body_html:
It's an issue about translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese.

Mr. @soumith:

It was a nice talk with you during the lunch today at GAN workshop, Taiwan.

I was very happy to get your permission to translate PyTorch tutorial.

Here is an example, which is translated from this page.

I raised this issue because I had contacted @chsasank before met you personally, and he suggested me to do so. He also mentioned that we need to figure how to host/publish the Chinese translation.

Cheers!

A list to record the progress:

What is PyTorch? - translated
Autograd: automatic differentiation - translated
Neural Networks - translated
Training a classifier - translated
Transfer Learning tutorial - translating

body:
It's an issue about translating PyTorch tutorial into Traditional Chinese.

Mr. @soumith:

It was a nice talk with you during the lunch today at GAN workshop, Taiwan.

I was very happy to get your permission to translate [PyTorch tutorial](http://pytorch.org/tutorials/).

Here is an [example](https://github.com/YinTaiChen/Understanding-PyTorch-in-Depth/blob/master/What%20is%20Pytorch.ipynb), which is translated from [this page](http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html).

I raised this issue because I had contacted @chsasank  before met you personally, and he suggested me to do so. He also mentioned that we need to figure how to host/publish the Chinese translation.

Cheers!

### A list to record the progress:
What is PyTorch? - [translated](https://github.com/YinTaiChen/PyTorch-Tutorial-Translated-into-Traditional-Chinese/blob/master/What%20is%20Pytorch.ipynb)
Autograd: automatic differentiation - [translated](https://github.com/YinTaiChen/PyTorch-Tutorial-Translated-into-Traditional-Chinese/blob/master/autograd_tutorial.ipynb)
Neural Networks - [translated](https://github.com/YinTaiChen/PyTorch-Tutorial-Translated-into-Traditional-Chinese/blob/master/neural_networks_tutorial.ipynb)
Training a classifier - [translated](https://github.com/YinTaiChen/PyTorch-Tutorial-Translated-into-Traditional-Chinese/blob/master/Training%20a%20Classifier.ipynb)
Transfer Learning tutorial - translating
